name: Titled Dog Game
description:
- Gameplay -

Move view  -  Mouse

Move   -  WASD

Jump   -   Spacebar

Inspect / pick up / grab and drag   -   Left mouse button

Bark   -   Right mouse button

Ram  -  E

Pause  -  ESC

Stuck?  Objectives are available in the pause menu

- Story -

After hearing a commotion outside your house and waking up to find your entire family missing, you decide to peruse the clues they left behind. As you make your way through the house looking for a means of escape, you find six pieces of evidence pointing closer to their whereabouts.

- Installation -

Source Files: https://drive.google.com/drive/u/0/folders/1dco1CiCshR6TgOFxgrSYZK_VJwVNNtqF

Downloadable for windows only  -  once downloaded, extract the contents of the file and run the game file named 'Titled Dog Game'
